name: Hot or cool man, Jazz is Jazz
description:
Journal entry - shoot day 13

"And we sat sunken and high in the midst of such wonderful… beautiful… the music… we rolled, we couldn’t stay still. It was pure joy as the world spun around us. Sweet perfection. In the name of life. And… and… and all that stands between us and greatness… here we are. Living. Being as we should… as if we could do anything else. The music swells and we fade away into everything and nothing. Sunday sinks away in splendid delight, as the drugs run higher. It is all ours… it's always been. Just take it.

What are you talking about? I'm not going to fucking lie to you guys. I feel pretty much exactly like I’ve ever felt before". 

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent film and paying the artists. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making.

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

PR + Trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

6/10
